name: Paris Tech
description:
ParisTech brings together twelve of the foremost French institutes of engineering education and research.

The member institutes of ParisTech are well-established mainly publicly-owned educational and research institutions, some of them were founded back in the 18th century. Ever since, they have stood at the forefront of technological and scientific developments in their field and have trained a majority of the engineers who have given rise to France's industrial achievements.
